profileDesc.creation: "Biographies of Famous Monks" written by Baochang until 515. Complete work now lost. Excerpted by Sōshō in Nara, Japan ca.1235.

encodingDesc.p: 文本中之人名、地名或日期，若於大正藏中之校勘用字較正確，則從校勘用字。
Wherever we can, within a name or date, identify a mistake in the main text of the Taisho canon and a better reading is available in the apparatus, the character from the apparatus is used.
